Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax period increase decrease
other comprehensive income loss foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: other comprehensive income unrealized holding gain loss on securities arising during period net of tax
other comprehensive income unrealized holding gain loss on securities arising during period tax

Exercise of Stock Options: stock issued during period value stock options exercised
Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period value restricted stock award gross
Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
comprehensive income net of tax attributable to noncontrolling interest
comprehensive income net of tax including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
minority interest decrease from distributions to noncontrolling interest holders
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
noncontrolling interest increase from subsidiary equity issuance
stock issued during period shares conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period shares restricted stock award gross
stock issued during period shares stock options exercised
stock options exercised and vesting of restricted stock shares
stock options exercised and vesting of restricted stock value
stock repurchased and retired during period shares
stock repurchased and retired during period value
